actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the basic educational assistance eligibility for veterans under chapter 34 and for certain dependents under chapter 35 from 36 to 45 months.

summary.text: Extends the basic educational assistance eligibility for veterans and for specified dependents of veterans from thirty-six to forty-five months. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1661)

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 34 of title 38, United States Code, to extend the basic educational assistance eligibility for veterans under chapter 34 and for certain dependents under chapter 35 from 36 to 45 months.
